Courses.title: Our courses
Courses.introduction: Bloom courses offer tailored information, tools, and affirming words to help us cope with trauma. They encourage us to learn, reflect, and process what we’ve been through and how it may have affected us–all in a safe and empowering space.

chat.title: Reflect with us
chat.description: If you’d like to share your reflections on this session, the Bloom team would love to hear from you!
chat.videoIntro: Find out more about how messaging works:
chat.detailPrivacy: Your messages are private and secure, they’re only ever seen by the Bloom team and you remain anonymous.
chat.detailTimezone: We work across many different timezones, so you should get a response from us within 6 hours, and it won’t be longer than 24 hours.
chat.detailLanguage: We are always available in English, French, Hindi, Portuguese or Spanish, but members of our team also speak Arabic, and Bangla; we’d be happy to arrange for you to speak with them.
chat.detailLegal: If you’re going through an active legal case, consider what you share with us as this can sometimes affect your case.
chat.detailImmediateHelp: If you’re in imminent threat or harm, please go to ‘Immediate help’ in the menu to find the right service to support you.

Courses.somaticsDescription: Discover how gentle, body-based approaches can support healing from violence, stress, and fear. This collection of resources offers clear, practical guidance to help us reconnect with our bodies, build resilience, and explore what safety and ease can feel like.
